title: Infrastructure: CI workflows, version-bump script, CHANGELOG, README
description: Build project infrastructure from SPEC.md. close_reason: Infrastructure complete: 2 builders produced 5 files across 2 branches. CI workflow (lint+typecheck+test on push/PR), auto-tag workflow (version sync + idempotent tagging + GitHub release), version-bump.ts (atomic semver bump with rollback), CHANGELOG.md (Keep a Changelog format), README.md (comprehensive docs). Both merge_ready signals sent to orchestrator.

title: Core implementation: project config, core modules, all commands, CLI entry, tests
description: Build the entire seeds CLI source code from SPEC.md. Includes: package.json, tsconfig.json, biome.json, src/types.ts, src/yaml.ts, src/id.ts, src/config.ts, src/store.ts, src/output.ts, src/index.ts (CLI entry + command router), all 12 command files in src/commands/, and all 7 test files. Must pass bun test, bun run lint, bun run typecheck. File area: package.json, tsconfig.json, biome.json, src/**
close_reason: Core seeds CLI implementation complete. 3 builders spawned and delivered: (1) foundation-builder: core modules + 34 tests, (2) commands-builder: full CLI + all 12 commands + 72 tests, (3) tests-infra-builder: 7 integration test files. All builder quality gates passed. merge_ready sent for all 3 branches. Recommended merge order: commands-builder first (most complete), then foundation-builder, then tests-infra-builder.

close_reason: Foundation builder delivered: package.json, tsconfig, biome, core modules (types/yaml/id/store/config/output), index.ts, stub commands, 34 passing tests. All quality gates pass.
